original_title: An Officer & A Gentleman: Sami Callihan
overview: Things are getting weird on this episode of An Officer & A Gentleman as the space cat himself, Sami Callihan joins the program. Whatâ€™s on the Death Machine's mind and why does he have a pillow over his crotch? How can he hate the color blue but like the flavor blue? All these answers and a whole lot more on this edition of AOAG.
title: An Officer & A Gentleman: Sami Callihan
